channel.title: Help with little box that shows experience in skills tab
channel.description: Okay so like when you hover your mouse of a skill you know how it shows how much expierience you got till next level and so on? Well the lower you get on the skills(for example summoning which is at the bottom) the more to the right that little box higlighted in red goes. [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2h52wbs.png[/img] How can I make it so it doesn't do that? Also so it shows the highlighted thing you have to click the skill first, how would I change this? Thank You!

your client… not client.class but your CLIENT in general

item.title: Help with little box that shows experience in skills tab
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

matzie:

LMAO i just realised the box said slayer O_o’ but none the less, get the bottom right coord for your slayer box and make it there =o

And in which class could i find this? Im using project insanity

item.title: Help with little box that shows experience in skills tab
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

this is client sided, not server sided, and has to do with a boundary changer. if i remember correctly it might be labeled, make a maxY set to the gameFrame width(should be a call to get it) and then just revert the x coord respectivley

Read full topic
